name: notion2wechat
description: Chrome extension to convert Notion articles to WeChat Official Account format

scripts.build:crx: pnpm run build && pnpm exec crx pack dist -o notion2wechat.crx
scripts.build:zip: pnpm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../notion2wechat-v1.0.0.zip .
scripts.build:load: pnpm run build && echo '请在浏览器开发者模式中加载 dist 文件夹'
